main event: A single unidentified object was observed moving in the sky, exhibiting a tail and changing colors from reddish to green.
interesting points: The object had a burning or glowing trail behind it.,The observation lasted about 10 minutes.,The object changed colors, sometimes appearing reddish-green.,The object was described as dark grayish and round, about the size of a car.,The report concludes that there is insufficient information regarding the incident.
witness description: The highly detailed report form suggests familiarity with similar phenomena and a structured observation process.
